subject: Attention Beneficiary ,
body:
Attention Beneficiary ,
Your Western Union Payment from European Union
This is to let you know that your Compensation Funds value $500.000 US have been processed and your payment will be through Western Union Money Transfer and you can Pick Up your payments of $4,000 US at western union office and we can send $4,000 x 3 which will be $12,000 US every day okay.
Note that before you can Pick up your payments then you have to pay the required to pay the cost of obtaining Affidavit of Claim from the Federal High Court, the Affidavit of Claim will enable us to Change your Name as Receiver of the first $12,000 that is 3 Transaction of $4,000 each and 
the cost of Affidavit cost little amount of money 
and you will go to any Western Union Office or Agent around you and pick up the Money today so if you will send the cost of the Affidavit today then let our Legal Department Officer to go to the Court and know the cost and you are rest assure that once the Affidavit is receive then you will pick up the THREE Western Union of $4,000 each that was sent.
Here are the MTCN Number for the first, second and Third Payments .
MTCN: 018-430-6428
MTCN: 061-671-1248
MTCN: 061-880-2943
You can also track your payment via Western Union Website
 
https: // www. westernunion.com/web/global-service/track-transfer
I’m waiting for your reply soon.
In God We Trust
Mr.Hilary Jackson
European Union Payment Center

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary ,
body:
Hello Jackson,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my Western Union payment from the European Union. I appreciate the information you have provided. Could you please clarify a few things for me?

1. What is the purpose of obtaining an Affidavit of Claim from the Federal High Court? How does it relate to receiving my payment?

2. You mentioned that I need to pay the cost of obtaining the Affidavit. Could you please let me know how much this cost would be?

3. Is it possible for me to pay for the Affidavit directly at a Western Union office or agent when I go to pick up my money? Or do I need to make the payment beforehand?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Hector

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary ,
body:
Attention --Hector 
Why did it took you 5 Months to respond to your Western Union Payment from European Union? 
 
 A--The purpose of obtaining the Affidavit of Claim from the Federal High Court is that we have to change your name as Receiver and the document has to be legalize so that the European Union will be sure of the person that receive the Western Union money. 
 
 B--The cost of obtaining affidavit is only €975 
 
 C--The cost of Affidavit has to be paid first and the document will be issue and legalize at the Federal High Court by our Legal Department before you will start using the Western Union MTCN 
 
 D--Due to time approved the MTCN BS,LOW 
 MTCN: 018-430-6428 
MTCN: 061-671-1248 
MTCN: 061-880-2943 
 sent to you since October has be cancelled because after 90 days it expires so we will send you the new MTCN numbers you will use but it depends on when the cost of Affidavit and legalizing of your document is received. 
 
 Note that before you can Pick up your payments you will be required to pay the cost of obtaining Affidavit of Claim from the Federal High Court, the Affidavit of Claim will enable us to Change your Name as Receiver of the first $12,000 that is 3 Transaction of $4,000 each 
I’m waiting for your reply soon. 
In God We Trust 
Mr.Hilary Jackson 
European Union Payment Center 
 
 
 Enviar: viernes 9 de febrero de 2024 a las 6:26 De: "Hector" <ru78715@***.com> Para: hilaryjacks@gmx.com Asunto: Re: Attention Beneficiary , 
 
Hello Jackson, 
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my Western Union payment from the European Union. I appreciate the information you have provided. Could you please clarify a few things for me? 
1. What is the purpose of obtaining an Affidavit of Claim from the Federal High Court? How does it relate to receiving my payment? 
2. You mentioned that I need to pay the cost of obtaining the Affidavit. Could you please let me know how much this cost would be? 
3. Is it possible for me to pay for the Affidavit directly at a Western Union office or agent when I go to pick up my money? Or do I need to make the payment beforehand? 
I look forward to your response.
Best wishes, 
Hector

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary ,
body:
Hello Hector,

Thank you for your response. I apologize for the delay in getting back to you. The purpose of obtaining an Affidavit of Claim from the Federal High Court is to ensure that the European Union can verify the identity of the person receiving the Western Union money. It is a legal document that will allow us to change your name as the receiver.

Regarding the cost of obtaining the Affidavit, it is only . Once this payment is made, our Legal Department will issue and legalize the document at the Federal High Court. After that, we can provide you with the new MTCN numbers for you to use.

Unfortunately, it is not possible to pay for the Affidavit directly at a Western Union office or agent when picking up your money. The cost needs to be paid first before we can proceed with issuing and legalizing the document.

I hope this clarifies things for you. If you have any more questions or concerns, please let me know.

Best wishes,
Hector
